title: Clean, Quiet, Upper 1 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Clean and beautiful 1 bdrm upper apartment ready for a clean, quiet, responsible tenant.
Forced air heat with digital thermostat
Coin laundry on premises ($1.75/ea per load wash & dry)
One adult spayed/neutered cat allowed w/ pet deposit.
Minimum 1 year at current job or proof of other income source.
No evictions or court landlord/tenant judgments past 10 years, positive rental history paying on time with landlord references.
If you are interested in this apartment, please send us an email and we will get back with you soon to answer any questions you may have and discuss renting the apartment.
